title: Digging the global mine: an interview with Saskia Sassen
abstract: This article contains an interview with Saskia Sassen who has written extensively on the issues related to globalization, on global cities; inequalities in the world economy; the transnational mobility of people and money; immigration trends and policies; digital technologies and global changes in state power and political sovereignty
